trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>evento ocorre somente quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>está definida ou seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>é de propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event is useful when you want to determine the error for a row depending on its state and the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: Manipulando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>evento é útil quando você quiser determinar o erro para uma linha, dependendo de seu estado e os valores que ele contém.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the row header unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Quando você processa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>evento e especifique o texto de erro no manipulador de um glifo de erro é exibida no cabeçalho da linha, a menos que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>está definida como `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário move o ponteiro do mouse sobre o glifo de erro, o texto de erro é exibida em uma dica de ferramenta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>evento também ocorre sempre que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é recuperada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine the state or value of a row, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para determinar o estado ou o valor de uma linha e use essas informações para alterar ou modificar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é inicializada com o valor da linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>propriedade, que substitui o valor do evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: Manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>evento ao trabalhar com grandes quantidades de dados para evitar as penalidades de desempenho de definir a linha <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>valor para várias linhas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [práticas recomendadas para dimensionamento do controle DataGridView do Windows Forms](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: When you create a DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um delegado DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventHandler, identifica o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
